en-US.summary: It's 1846 in Independence, Missouri. You and your family have decided to become pioneers and travel the Oregon Trail. Will you make it to Oregon City?
examplePhrases: I want to be a banker.
en-US.name: Oregon Trail
en-US.description: Packed with fun just like the classic game, the Oregon Trail takes you on a journey across the West with historic landmarks and forts along the way. Hunt for big game, cross rivers your way, take a chance with shortcuts, and most of all, hope that fate is on your side.
